main event: A circular object was sighted in the sky over Milford, Ohio on July 23, 1954 at around 2:40 PM.
interesting points: The Department of Defense and the Clermont County Civilian Defense Office received numerous telephone calls reporting the sighting.
The object was described as a strange circular shape in the sky.
The report was forwarded to the Air Technical Intelligence Center at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
The report was considered a possible sighting but had insufficient data for analysis.
No further investigative action was contemplated unless specifically requested by the Air Technical Intelligence Center.
sighted object: a circular object in the sky
witnesses: multiple callers to the Department of Defense and Clermont County Civilian Defense Office
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
